xmp_schema.description: $$$/xmp/xmpTPg_description=The Paged-Text schema is used for text appearing on a page in a document.
xmp_schema.label: $$$/xmp/xmpTPg_label=Paged-Text

xmp_property.name: MaxPageSize
xmp_property.description: $$$/xmp/xmpTPg/MaxPageSize_description=The size of the largest page in the document (including any in contained documents).
xmp_property.label: $$$/xmp/xmpTPg/MaxPageSize_label=Max Page Size

xmp_property.name: NPages
xmp_property.description: $$$/xmp/xmpTPg/NPages_description=The number of pages in the document (including any in contained documents).
xmp_property.label: $$$/xmp/xmpTPg/NPages_label=Number of Pages

xmp_property.name: Fonts
xmp_property.description: $$$/xmp/xmpTPg/Fonts_description=An unordered array of fonts that are used in the document (including any in contained documents).
xmp_property.label: $$$/xmp/xmpTPg/Fonts_label=Fonts

xmp_property.name: Colorants
xmp_property.description: $$$/xmp/xmpTPg/Colorants_description=An ordered array of colorants (swatches) that are used in the document (including any in contained documents).
xmp_property.label: $$$/xmp/xmpTPg/Colorants_label=Colorants

xmp_property.name: PlateNames
xmp_property.description: $$$/xmp/xmpTPg/PlateNames_description=An ordered array of plate names that are needed to print the document (including any in contained documents).
xmp_property.label: $$$/xmp/xmpTPg/PlateNames_label=Plate Names
